urls.title: Economic Impact of Climate Change
urls.description: In partnership with the British Embassy as part of the lead up to the United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP26), the Peterson Institute for International Economics (PIIE) will host a panel

text:
PIIE: NOW: Emma Howard Boyd of the UK @EnvAgency joins us & @UKinUSA to discuss the dangers climate change poses to the economy & what investors need to think about on how to get to net zero carbon emissions. #COP26 #TogetherForOurPlanet 
Watch live: https://t.co/DlWT8Q2rQ1 …
